official_title: Expressing support for the designation of a Pink Prayer Day and applauding the actions of medical professionals and other caregivers, researchers, patients and their families, and others who strive to combat and raise public awareness of breast cancer.

summary.text: Expresses support for the designation of a Pink Prayer Day and applauds the actions of those who strive to combat and raise public awareness of breast cancer.
